Title: Divines
Writer: Houda Benyamina (adaptation), Houda Benyamina (dialogue), Houda Benyamina (screenplay), Romain Compingt (adaptation), Romain Compingt (dialogue), Romain Compingt (screenplay), Malik Rumeau (screenplay)
Actors: Oulaya Amamra, Déborah Lukumuena, Kevin Mischel, Jisca Kalvanda
Plot: A street teenager from a dysfunctional family from a banlieue (HLMs) in Paris comes across a young dancer who turns her life upside down.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 14 wins & 10 nominations.
